title: Interpretation of a dream about sweeping a carpet

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about sweeping a carpet in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about sweeping a carpet in a dream. It is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is a sign of good or evil. The dream and its good interpretation is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about sweeping a carpet in a dream can indicate a dream. A person who cleans carpets leads to the fulfillment of desires and dreams, thanks to God. In the case of seeing carpet sweeping in a dream, this may indicate a high position that the dreamer may reach during this period, and God knows best. In the case of seeing carpet sweeping in a dream, it may indicate problems and difficulties. The relationship that the dreamer faces in his life and during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing carpets in a dream indicates the desire to fulfill the dreams and aspirations of the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a green carpet in a dream. Anyone who sees a green carpet in his dream may indicate that he will hear happy news. In the coming days, thanks to God. Dreaming of a green carpet in a dream may indicate the marital and family stability they enjoy during this time, and God knows best. In the case of a person, a green carpet may indicate the end of a financial crisis that the dreamer has suffered from for a long time. The dream may indicate A green carpet in a man’s dream indicates that God’s grace will facilitate his affairs and circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about making carpets in a dream: Seeing girls laying a carpet in a dream may indicate the lawful ruling that the dreamer may obtain during this period, and God knows best. In the event that one sees making carpets In a dream, this may indicate that he is a person who approaches God, Blessed and Almighty, and performs many acts of worship. Seeing a person making carpets may indicate that he is a religious, moral person, thanks to God. Dreaming of years of carpet in a dream may indicate great material gains that the dreamer may acquire during This period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sitting on a carpet in a dream. Sitting on carpets in a dream may mean traveling on Umrah or Hajj for the sake of insight, thanks to God. A person’s dream that he was sitting on a folded carpet may indicate that he is going through a major crisis that will pass for a period of time. In the event that there is If a person sits on the carpet in a dream, this may indicate happy dreams that may occur to the visionary on those days, thanks to God. Seeing him sitting on the carpet in a dream may indicate the end of the financial problems and debts that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about urinating on the carpet in the house in a dream: Urinating on the carpet in a dream may indicate the actions of the person with bad vision and he must stop it. If you see urinating on the carpet in a dream inside the house, this may indicate some financial obstacles that the people of the house are facing at that time and they need To seek help from God. Seeing urinating on house carpets in a dream may indicate some wrong things that the dreamer is doing and that he is ashamed of them at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a prayer rug descending from the sky in a dream: Seeing a carpet descending from the sky may indicate

title: Interpretation of the death of a girl in a dream Seeing the death of a girl in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for the death of a girl, for a single girl, for a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man, if I dreamed that my daughter died, the death of my little daughter, the eldest, the death of a boy by Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Shaheen, and others. The death of a son or daughter in a dream is one of the most common dreams. It is frightening to the dreamer, which causes extreme confusion and anxiety to see it, as the person after seeing it experiences a lot of fear and terror for a son or daughter, as the death of a son in life is very heartbreaking, and it is one of the difficult things for all people, but it is the most difficult thing that a person can face. In his life, and when he sees him in a dream, a person develops a dream of fear and anxiety until the son learns the dream. The dream interpreter Ibn Sirin explained to us in his various interpretations many different meanings and interpretations about seeing the death of a son or daughter in a dream, which a person should know in detail. Interpretation The death of a girl in a dream. The meaning of the interpretation of the death of a girl in a dream. Whoever dreams that his daughter has given up on comfort. The death of a daughter in a dream is evidence of loss and evil for the dreamer. The death of a daughter in a dream is evidence of a great loss of money, as the girl is the source of a man’s livelihood and life. Also, seeing your daughter die in a dream It means defeat before an enemy or competitor, and the dream shows sadness and anxiety that the dreamer will suffer because of problems. The death of a daughter in a dream is evidence of evil that harms the dreamer, as the girl is a source of livelihood in life. The death of a daughter in a dream is evidence of the death of the father or mother or the loss of a close person in the future. The relative. A mother seeing that her daughter died in a dream and she was crying a lot is evidence of the worries and sorrows that will befall her in the near future. Seeing a dead child in a dream is a sign that you are completely far from God. The death of a son and his return to life again in a dream is evidence of... The evil that will return to the dreamer. If the son returns to life after death in a dream, this is evidence of the misfortunes and disasters that will befall the dreamer. The son’s return to life in a dream after death indicates the return of a strong and powerful enemy to the dreamer, and it also indicates the return of problems, disagreements, and conflicts that The person suffered from it in the past. Interpretation of the death of a son in a dream. The death of a son in a dream is evidence of the abundance of goodness that will come to the dreamer and freedom from danger. The death of a son in a dream also indicates the end of problems, anxiety, and sadness. The death of my son in a dream is evidence of victory over enemies through the behavior of all competitors. The death of a son in a dream is a sign of the abundance of goodness, whether you have a son or not. The death of a son also shows the great relief of all worries and success. The death of a son in a dream is a sign of goodness, blessing, and abundance of livelihood for a person. The death of a son is also a sign of blessing and victory for the enemy by losing an enemy. For you. The death of a son in a dream is a sign of escaping from the machinations and misfortunes that may befall you. For a sinner to see that his son has died in a dream is evidence of the guidance that he will receive. Crying over the death of a son in a dream is evidence of freedom from worries and problems.

However, seeing the dead combing the hair of the living can mean Comfort and comfort, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about eating rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating rice in a dreamA place believed to seeEating rice in a dreamIt is one of the recurring visions of people, and it has been interpreted by superior interpreters and interpreted according to the dream situation, but in most interpretations it is a praiseworthy vision for the pioneer.Interpretation of a dream about eating rice in a dream by Ibn SirinIt is known that Ibn Sirin is one of the most famous interpreters The Arabs and their explanation in his book Interpretations of Dreams about eating rice in a dream, which we will know through the website, is different, as follows: Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating rice, this is a sign of glaucoma, very good and a blessing in halal money. If one sees in a dream that he is eating cooked rice, this means many profits and gains that He achieves it and receives a great benefit from someone close to him. Whoever dreams of eating rice and chicken, this indicates good health and a long life for the dreamer. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of spoiled and bad-tasting rice as suffering from poverty, distress, lack of livelihood, and bad luck. If you see yourself eating delicious rice with meat, This is a sign of joy, hearing happy news, and changing the dreamer’s life for the better. Seeing yourself eating rice with milk in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams, ambitions, aspirations, and achieving desired goals. If you see yourself eating rice mixed with dirt, this is a sign of separation from friends. Interpretation of eating rice in a dream for a woman Single womanIf an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating rice with a familiar person, this indicates her engagement and marriage to someone she loves and has wanted for a long time. If she dreams that she is eating rice with fish, this means good luck and hearing the good and happy news that will come to her soon. If she dreams that she is eating rice with fish, this means good luck and hearing the good and happy news that will come to her soon. If she dreams That she eats rice with milk, it means that she will achieve everything she wants in work, study, marriage, and all aspects of her life. If she sees in her dream that she is eating cooked rice, this means that she will marry a man who has the qualities that she wanted and waited for for a long time. If she sees that she is eating raw rice Cooked, it means that someone will propose to her, but this does not suit her. Interpretation of eating rice in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating rice with meat, this means an increase in glaucoma, almost weakness and a blessing for her husband and children. If she sees in her dream that she She eats boiled rice, this means that she will get pregnant soon, if she is expecting pregnancy in the recent period. If she sees herself eating rice to taste its taste, this means that she will be able to take charge of her home and please her husband. If she dreams that she is eating rice and has hair, this indicates That there is a big problem for her or one of her family members, but it will be resolved soon. If she sees that she is eating cooked rice with her husband in a dream, this indicates that there will be many good things for her and her family and that her husband will be promoted in his work. Eating rice in a dream for a pregnant womanIf she sees A pregnant woman in the first months dreams that she is eating white rice, this means that she will give birth to a boy and will be very happy with him after his birth. But if she sees that she is eating white rice with etc.

title: Interpretation of seeing the bride in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the bride at home: The vision indicates people close to the dreamer who have the qualities of hatred and hatred and also want to harm the dreamer. Entering into marriage. Returning to the house in a dream is an indication of problems other than arguments, as well as difficult problems facing the people of the house. The vision also indicates that you are hearing news Bad or falling into distress. Seeing a bride in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes anxiety and a feeling of fear, as well as a feeling of insecurity because of those around her. If the bride cannot leave the house, this is a sign that she is facing many difficulties and problems. The spread of a large number of marriages It indicates strife and lies. It also symbolizes an epidemic or the spread of a disease. Also, a dream in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates some pain that she feels during childbirth and it will subside quickly. To see the bride eating at home is a sign of a deceitful relative, in addition to his hatred for the family. House. A married woman who sees this dream is a sign of a malicious person who is trying to cause her problems regardless of his hatred for her. Who saw a wedding in a dream? The vision shows that the dreamer knows the oppressor because he gets his right. He announces his presence. Marriage in bed. This leads to problems between the man And his wife, where the wife deviates from her husband’s will, and God knows best. In a dream, the bride also expresses the enemies surrounding her in the form of friends. Seeing a wedding in general indicates injustice and corruption. The death of the bride in a dream is evidence of earning abundant money in addition to goodness and blessing in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing a bride in a dream. See the point. The wedding indicates a feeling of fear for the future, in addition to anxiety about losing one’s job. The dream is also expressed in the dream of an unmarried young man, as he carries the traits of a difficult nature, but he does not give in to problems and is determined to implement what he wants. The married man who sees Having sex in his bed is evidence that he is married to a difficult woman. The vision also shows that someone close is trying to destroy his house, so he must be careful. Seeing the bride in the kitchen indicates financial difficulties and warns against wasting money randomly. Interpretation of a dream about getting married from home The bride leaving the house In a dream, it indicates freedom from anxiety and sadness. The vision symbolizes paying off debts and fulfilling needs in addition to facilitating the financial situation. Married / Married Women Seeing this dream portends the end of disputes with her husband, in addition to getting rid of the period of distress that she is going through. An unmarried young man in his dream indicates That he will find a suitable job and move away from the people around him in his life, as a new period begins. The vision also promises excellence in studies and work. If a man sees his bride leaving his house, this is a sign of the abundance of livelihood that he will receive after the hardships he went through. Interpretation of the death of the bride in A dream about the death of a bride in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates her fear of giving birth. The vision also indicates that you are suffering from severe anxiety and tension because of the people around you. This dream foretells the death of troubles and sorrows that the dreamer faces, in addition to the

title: Interpretation of a dream about lemon

preview.html: Is seeing a lemon picked different from seeing it as juice, and are the colors of lemon interpreted differently in a dream? Interpretation of seeing a lemon in a dream for one girl. Interpretation of a single woman seeing a lemon in her dream according to its color. If she sees a yellow lemon, this means that she will feel hatred towards those around her. She is jealous. From some of the girls around her. But if one girl sees a green lemon in a dream. She is a girl who loves goodness for people and stands out in her family for her kindness and purity. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream picking lemons from a tree. It means that a person has advanced to his connection with him, takes care of him, and fears God in him. One of the unfavorable visions is to see her squeezing a lemon. It indicates that she is exposed to psychological pressure and suffering, and God knows best. Seeing lemon juice means feeling remorse as a result of wrong actions in her life. One girl in a dream offers lemon juice because she likes to lie to people. Or she is making an effort. Great to achieve her goal in life. If a single girl sees a lemon tree in a dream, she has a lot of money. Do good to people and you will have a wide and abundant life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about oranges for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing lemons in a dream for a married woman. Green lemons in a dream for a married woman are good. Very and wonderful livelihood. It also indicates a lot of money, the coming good news, God willing. Seeing a married woman in her dream picking lemons from a tree. God will bless her with a new pregnancy that will satisfy her family. Yellow lemons in a married woman’s dream indicate worry and anxiety, and God knows best. Lemon indicates Yellow also indicates family disputes with her husband. A married woman picks a ripe green lemon from a tree. This means that he will gain knowledge, money, or anything of value. A lemon in a married woman’s dream, if she is satisfied with it, portends family stability. He will soon hear good news God willing. Sour lemons in a dream usually have a bad reputation among people. Yellow lemons may indicate a married woman’s dream. She was sick for a while but she will recover, God willing. Interpretation of seeing lemons in a dream about a man and its meaningIf one sees in his dream that he is picking A yellow lemon. Evidence of an abundance of food, blessings, and money, God willing. And evidence of success in a job or project, God willing. When a man sees himself in a dream picking a beautiful green lemon, he will obtain huge sums of money from a profitable business or project, God willing. As for the yellow lemon, it indicates On illness, and God knows best. A lemon in a man’s dream means a good reputation and character among people. He is a man who loves doing good to people and helping them. The man was drinking lemon juice in his dream, and sadness and worry were on his shoulders. Buying lemon juice for a man in his dream means a change in his situation for the better, with permission. God. If a man collects lemon juice in his dream, he will achieve what he wants, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a lemon in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. The meaning of seeing lemons in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A lemon in a pregnant woman’s dream portends a new baby whose health will be good, God willing. And that her pregnancy will pass safely and she will give birth without pain. Tired and

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting a jinn in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hitting a jinn in a dream. Some people search for an interpretation of a dream about hitting a jinn in a dream. It is one of the dreams that make the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for that, so you will discover its interpretation in the following lines. These are the interpretations of some working scholars and site managers. They do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather convey interpretations. Scientists. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a jinn in a dream. Whoever dreams that he hits his pants, this may indicate a financial loss that the dreamer may suffer during that period. Beating soldiers in a dream may indicate the presence of some obstacles in the dreamer’s life and that he will get rid of them. And in the event that one believes that he hits his pants This may indicate the presence of enemies who wish to harm him and that he will get rid of them, thank God. Hitting jeans in a dream indicates the quarrel that the dreamer will get rid of during his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of hitting my grandmother in a dream Hitting my grandmother in a dream may indicate a large sum of money. Which the dreamer gets during this period. It is possible that seeing the grandmother being beaten in a dream indicates the blessings and goodness that the dreamer will receive during this time, and God knows best. Seeing the grandmother being beaten in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer in his life during this period. All Whoever sees in his dream that he was beating his grandmother, it could indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer is obtaining at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of beating a cat to death in a dream: Beating a cat to death in a dream may mean an end to the worries and sadness that the dreamer was facing in His life at that time. In the case of my personal opinion that he was beating the cat to death, this may indicate rejection of a crisis and problem that the dreamer was facing at that time. Killing the cat due to repeated beatings may indicate the end of the injustice that was on the dreamer’s shoulders in those days, I swear to God I know. And in the case of his personal view of beating the cat to death, this may indicate that he stopped the sin that he was doing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting Satan in the form of a human in a dream. Striking Satan who was present in human form could indicate the end The crisis that the dreamer suffered during his life at that time. Whoever dreams that he is hitting Satan, could indicate the end of the envy or eye that fell on him in those days. Beating Satan in a human form in a dream may indicate getting rid of the presence of evil people in the life of the dreamer. During this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting my maid in a dream: The maid hitting the dreamer in a dream may indicate good things that will come to the dreamer during this time. If someone sees the maid hitting him, this may indicate that circumstances have changed for the better, thanks to God. In the event that one sees that the maid is hitting him, this may indicate wrong decisions made by the dreamer and he must stop them immediately. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a pig in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is hitting a pig, it may indicate that he will get rid of the hostility that was present in his life during the period Previous: Hitting a pig in a dream could indicate...

title: Interpretation of a mouse in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a mouse in a dream: The mouse belongs to the rodent family and is considered one of the animals that many people do not like. Some people believe that seeing a mouse in a dream is not very promising, but there are many interpretations of this. Learn about it in this article. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is hitting the mouse hard on the head, this is evidence that the girl remembers someone poorly and she must stop. And if he sees that he is talking to the mouse, this is a sign that he will accompany New people. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream a white mouse playing next to her and she is not afraid of it, this is a sign that some disturbing things will happen in her life, but she will soon get rid of these problems. And if she sees that she is hitting a small mouse, this is evidence that she In her life, she will get rid of a weak enemy and God will provide for her. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees a large, black mouse in her dream, this is a sign that she will face a big problem in her life. And if she sees that she is killing a huge mouse and getting rid of it, this is evidence that she will get rid of it. From all the problems in her life. If a divorced woman sees that she is letting out a mouse that entered her house and she is able to get the mouse out of it, then God will grant her happiness in her life and she will get rid of everything. Problems. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a mouse inside her house and takes it out immediately, this is a sign that she is facing a health crisis and will recover quickly. Seeing a mouse eating clothes in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she is facing a major financial crisis, but God will get her out of it soon. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a man: If a man sees in a dream that he is beating a mouse until it kills it, this is evidence that he will get rid of all financial crises in his life and God will give him a lot of money. If a man sees that a mouse is trying to bite him, and the mouse cannot do that, then this Evidence that he is going through a financial crisis, but he will get through it unscathed. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream for a young man: If a young man dreams of a mouse in his room and he is trying to get it out, this is evidence that he will face some problems in his life, but he will get rid of them quickly. But if the young man sees in his dream that He hits a mouse until he kills it, this is a sign that he will get rid of a financial crisis in his life and he will have a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing black mice in a dream If one sees a black mouse in a dream, this indicates that there are many enemies around him. And getting rid of a black mouse is a sign To triumph over enemies and get rid of problems in your life. If someone dreams of a black rat biting him, this is evidence of a financial crisis that will affect his life, but it will pass quickly. Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream according to Nabul: If someone dreams of a mouse playing in his house, this is evidence of his abundance, because the mouse Not in a place without food. Whoever sees a mouse playing and running during his sleep during the day, this is evidence that the fortuneteller will live a long life. Whoever sees that he is killing a mouse, this is evidence that he speaks ill of the fortuneteller.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream. We may find that some people want to know the interpretation of dreams of a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream, and it is one of the interpretations that some people want to find. What is the meaning of this dream and is it a sign of good or evil? The website mentioned that some interpreters are diligent scholars and scientists who tried to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, and they are the interpretations of scholars.Interpretation of a dream of a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream. A woman who sees that her husband gives her a nightgown may indicate positive changes occurring in her life during this period thanks to God. The dream of a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate the emotional closeness that is occurring between them at this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of desires and desires during this period, and God knows best. Seeing a husband giving his wife a nightgown in a dream may indicate a happy event coming to the family in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving saffron in a dream: It is possible that seeing a gift of saffron in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good morals, and God knows best. A dream about giving Saffron in a dream indicates the good nature of the vision and its closeness to those around him. If a person sees that he is giving saffron to those around him, this may indicate the good deeds that he does for others thanks to God. In the event that you see a gift of saffron in a dream, it may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams during This period is thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of a mother giving gold to her daughter in a dream. If a girl sees that her mother was giving her gold as a gift, this may indicate that she will be fine at that time, and God knows best. A dream of a mother giving gold in a dream to her daughter may indicate the broad life that may happen. On the girl in those days. Anyone who sees in her dream that she is receiving gold from her mother in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in her life during that period. If one sees a mother giving a soccer ball to her daughter in a dream, this may indicate her assuming a high position and her success in practical life. Thanks to God.Interpretation of a dream about giving a black rosary in a dream. Giving a black rosary in a dream may indicate the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer may gain during this time, and God knows best. A person dreams that he received a black rosary in a dream as a gift, which may indicate a lot of money and a source of wealth. The great livelihood that he can obtain in those days. If one sees himself taking the black rosary in a dream, this may indicate goodness that will come to him in the coming season thanks to God. Anyone who dreams of giving someone a black rosary may indicate joys coming at that time. And God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of giving away cigarettes in a dream. Giving away cigarettes in a dream may indicate the generosity that the dreamer enjoys at this time, and God knows best. In the event that a person sees that he is giving another person cigarettes as a gift, this may indicate the presence of new friends entering his life During this period. of the nations

title: Interpretation of hearing the name in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The name in a dream by Ibn Sirini carries with it many meanings and repercussions for dreamers and makes them passionate about knowing them, and given the multiple interpretations provided to us by our distinguished scholars on this subject, the following article will present to us the most important of these interpretations. In a clear way, let us read the following. The name in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision in a dream of someone calling him by a name different from his own as evidence of many changes that will occur in his life in the coming days and that will make him very happy. If one sees in his dream that someone is calling him by a name Similar to one of the companions, this is a sign of the many benefits that he will receive as a result of his desire to avoid everything that displeases the Lord (Glory be to Him). If the dreamer sees the name Ghaith in front of him during his sleep, it expresses his ability to overcome the difficulties that prevented him from achieving his goals and he will be able to achieve his goal very easily after that. Seeing the dreamer in his dream with the name Ali symbolizes that he will obtain a very important promotion in the future. His workplace will contribute to him gaining a very special status among his colleagues in the profession. The name in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin sees the dream of an unmarried woman in a dream asking about one of the names that carry good meanings, as it is a sign of the abundant goodness that she will enjoy in her life in the coming days. Coming.If the dreamer sees during her sleep that she is calling one of the names of God Almighty, this is a sign that she has achieved something she has always dreamed of and will be very pleased with this. Case. If the dreamer sees in her dream that someone calls her by the name Maria, this expresses the good qualities that distinguish her and make her very dear to the hearts of everyone around her. Seeing a girl with the name Alia in a dream symbolizes that she has a very strong personality that makes her able to achieve what You want in life without any surrender or boredom. The name in the dream of the woman who married Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of a married woman in a dream with the name Ibtihal as evidence of the quiet life she was enjoying at that time with her husband and children and her wish that nothing would disturb her from the tranquility they were enjoying. If the dreamer sees the name Sundus in his dream, this means that her husband will receive a lot of money that will contribute to a significant improvement in his living situation. If the dreamer sees during her sleep someone calling her one of the names of the daughters of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, this is a sign of the death of her father. He is satisfied with her because she was pious towards him and was very keen to please him. In a dream, a woman sees her husband calling him by one of the names of the prophets. This is good news for her that his situation with her will improve a lot in the next few days and he will begin to change his circumstances to gain her approval. The name in a dream for Ibn Sirin’s pregnant wifeIbn Sirin believes that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with one of the names that carry good meanings, such as Fatima or Aziza, means that she has not She faces any problems in her pregnancy. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she names her child Muhammad, this means that she will greatly improve his upbringing and will enjoy seeing him in a very special situation in the future. If she sees a woman

Seeing the dreamer in his dream with the name Ali symbolizes that he will obtain a very important promotion in the future. His workplace will contribute to him gaining a very special status among his colleagues in the profession. The name in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin sees the dream of an unmarried woman in a dream asking about one of the names that carry good meanings, as it is a sign of the abundant goodness that she will enjoy in her life in the coming days. Coming.If the dreamer sees during her sleep that she is calling one of the names of God Almighty, this is a sign that she has achieved something she has always dreamed of and will be very pleased with this. Case. If the dreamer sees in her dream that someone calls her by the name Maria, this expresses the good qualities that distinguish her and make her very dear to the hearts of everyone around her. Seeing a girl with the name Alia in a dream symbolizes that she has a very strong personality that makes her able to achieve what You want in life without any surrender or boredom. The name in the dream of the woman who married Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of a married woman in a dream with the name Ibtihal as evidence of the quiet life she was enjoying at that time with her husband and children and her wish that nothing would disturb her from the tranquility they were enjoying. If the dreamer sees the name Sundus in his dream, this means that her husband will receive a lot of money that will contribute to a significant improvement in his living situation. If the dreamer sees during her sleep someone calling her one of the names of the daughters of the Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, this is a sign of the death of her father. He is satisfied with her because she was pious towards him and was very keen to please him. In a dream, a woman sees her husband calling him by one of the names of the prophets. This is good news for her that his situation with her will improve a lot in the next few days and he will begin to change his circumstances to gain her approval. The name in a dream for Ibn Sirin’s pregnant wifeIbn Sirin believes that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with one of the names that carry good meanings, such as Fatima or Aziza, means that she has not She faces any problems in her pregnancy. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she names her child Muhammad, this means that she will greatly improve his upbringing and will enjoy seeing him in a very special situation in the future.
